      • act

        public void act​(T player)
         throws game.util.NoMoreRessourcesException,
                game.util.InvalidChoiceException
        first, asks the player which ressource he wants to exchange, then asks which one he wants te receive in exchange. If all the conditions are met, the exchange takes place.
        Specified by:
        act in interface Action<T extends game.Player>
        Parameters:
        player - the player
        Throws:
        game.util.InvalidChoiceException - if the choice is invalid
        game.util.NoMoreRessourcesException - if you don't have the ressources
